name: Retail Mayhem
description:
Retail Mayhem is a game made in 3 hours under for the GameJam Trijam #181

In Retail Mayhem you are to fill up the containers at the aisles this score based game before your boss fires you for leaving the aisles empty.

You can unlock a dash ability which you can use with the space bar when you reach 5, more was intended to be added but found myself stuck when implementing and had to scrap the rest
